post.body: Oh, Michele! How funny. Nice to see your face.
<raising hand>
Hi, Jane - great. Ratings are on the list. On the other, do you mean something not available at Amazon?
Without having read the book, I got the sense that they're sort of talking past each other.
Me too, on both counts.
I'm glad I'm not the only one who does stuff like that!
I'm saving my pennies in case it's true. (Already being devoted to ebooks on iPhone)
